LanguageData:
Arachnae Honey-Pot A large **Node-swarm** of the Arachnae, this large species has a wide-ranging diet. It can swallow and decompose many unprocessed organisms whole to nourish the swarm as **Arachnae Honey**.

It can perform **Hauling, Cooking, and Plant-cutting/Sowing** tasks, but its **combat ability is very low**.

As a Node-swarm, it can breed and manage several **Arachnae Corrosion Auxiliary-swarms (Hoshichu)** to assist with harvesting and sowing tasks for the hive. ArachnaeNode Hair Lifetime The lives of the Arachnae Node-swarms move precisely and regularly, like sophisticated clockwork. head
Arachnae Shield-Head A **Node-swarm** of the Arachnae with a highly developed carapace covering its head and legs, which it sheds regularly to supply **Chitin** to the hive.

It can perform **Hauling, Mining, and Construction** tasks. Its **combat ability is average but its defense is excellent**.

As a Node-swarm, it can breed and manage several **Arachnae Hard-Jaw Auxiliary-swarms** to assist with mineral excavation for the hive. ArachnaeNode Hair hair skin Lifetime The lives of the Arachnae Node-swarms move precisely and regularly, like sophisticated clockwork. head
Arachnae Artisan A **Node-swarm** of the Arachnae, this insectoid is rare outside of the Queen, as it possesses the ability to spin cocoons. It excretes **Organ Cocoons**, which, following pheromone information, are directed to evolve into specific **Armament Organs** for the swarm's use.

It can perform **Hauling, Crafting, and Artistic** tasks. Its **combat ability is average but it is extremely fragile**.

As a Node-swarm, it can breed and manage several **Arachnae Domestic Auxiliary-swarms** to assist with hive cleaning and hauling tasks. ArachnaeNode Hair hair skin Lifetime The lives of the Arachnae Node-swarms move precisely and regularly, like sophisticated clockwork. head
Arachnae Warrior A **Node-swarm** of the Arachnae and the true warrior of the hive. It possesses tenacious **plastic genes** and gains many abilities as technology develops.

It can perform **Hauling, Hunting, and Animal Taming/Training** tasks. Its **combat ability is excellent, and its mobility is high**.

As a Node-swarm, it can project the extremely bothersome, though short-lived, **Arachnae Acid-Bite Auxiliary-swarms** at enemies to disrupt enemy ranged fire. ArachnaeNode Hair hair skin Lifetime The lives of the Arachnae Node-swarms move precisely and regularly, like sophisticated clockwork. head giant scythe
Arachnae Progenitor A **Node-swarm** of the Arachnae, this is a highly undifferentiated, special individual. It controls the host's body through a unique **neural link tube** and can emit a **psy-signal** causing those around it to ignore its presence. However, due to its extreme fragility, proper work is difficult before **completing its parasitic phase**.

It can perform **all tasks except Research**, but its **combat ability is practically non-existent**.

Unlike normal Arachnae, its undifferentiated physical structure prevents it from bearing Auxiliary-swarms. ArachnaeNode Hair hair skin head
Arachnae Mist-Shroud A large **Node-swarm** of the Arachnae, it possesses a massive body covered in a thick carapace and the ability to **spray pheromones over a wide area to summon Auxiliary-swarms**. Although slow-moving, it boasts **armor-like durability in combat**.

It can perform **Hauling** tasks. Its **combat ability, defense, and durability are all excellent**.

As a Node-swarm, it can breed and manage many **Arachnae Domestic Auxiliary-swarms** to assist with hive cleaning and hauling tasks. ArachnaeNode Hair hair skin Lifetime The lives of the Arachnae Node-swarms move precisely and regularly, like sophisticated clockwork. head
Arachnae Sky-Raider A large **Node-swarm** of the Arachnae, considered one of the elite. It possesses a **giant physique and proud flying ability**, making it the sole sovereign of the hive's skies.

It can perform **Hauling** tasks. Its **combat ability is excellent, and it exhibits high mobility** on the battlefield.

As a Node-swarm, it can launch **Sky-Nest Auxiliary-swarms** at enemies, which automatically track and continuously bite the foe. ArachnaeNode Hair hair skin Lifetime The lives of the Arachnae Node-swarms move precisely and regularly, like sophisticated clockwork. head
Arachnae Neuro-Weaver A **Node-swarm** of the Arachnae and the **most specialized insectoid**. While under the Queen's management, it retains **high intellect and self-awareness**, and can construct a **neural network** with others to perform complex **research and computation**. During computation, it becomes unaware of the outside world, making it a particularly protected presence within the hive. hair skin ArachnaeNode Hair ArachnaeNode Hair head
Arachnae Praetorian A **Node-swarm** of the Arachnae, an **elite soldier** selected and cultivated by the Queen, serving as her spokesperson. It possesses a **rare social ability** within the hive, can equip **large armament organs** despite its small stature, and can command surrounding insectoids to **flexibly adapt to any combat situation**.

It can perform **Hauling, Social, and Artistic** tasks. Its **combat ability is excellent, and its shooting skill is unparalleled**.

As a Node-swarm, it can hatch a large number of **Arachnae Acid-Bite Auxiliary-swarms** at once to construct a troublesome frontline. ArachnaeNode Hair ArachnaeNode Hair hair skin Lifetime The lives of the Arachnae Node-swarms move precisely and regularly, like sophisticated clockwork. <ArachnaeNode_
